analysis.description:
PonziSeller.withdrawETH (/unique_chucks/8/0xb7e253fd6a3bbb018ce6aa041514b21f0e68a9c8.sol#184-191) sends eth to arbitrary user

	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/8/0xb7e253fd6a3bbb018ce6aa041514b21f0e68a9c8.sol#1): it allows old versions
